title: Evolution of Healthcare Subcultures: Exploring Change through Double-Loop Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: A project-based assessment process using digital devices to analyze the historical development of healthcare subcultures and organizational learning mechanisms

learning_goals: Three or more evolutionary stages of healthcare subcultures can be explained from a deutero-learning (double-loop learning) perspective
Organizational culture formation factors can be analyzed by comparing cases of pathological and positive deutero-learning
Project deliverables visualizing governance models of healthcare subcultures using digital tools can be submitted
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
